subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Jerzy Janowicz beat his fellow Pole Lukasz Kubot in the quarterfinals at Wimbledon to become the first Polish man to reach a Grand Slam semifinal.
snippet: Jerzy Janowicz beat his fellow Pole Lukasz Kubot in the quarterfinals at Wimbledon to become the first Polish man to reach a Grand Slam semifinal.
